name: Mandazi
description: Fluffy Swahili doughnuts with a hint of coconut, perfect with tea or coffee.

name: Chapati
description: Traditional Kenyan flatbread, soft and layered, made with whole wheat flour.

name: Mkate wa Sinzia
description: Sweet coconut bread with a soft texture and aromatic coconut flavor.

name: Samosa
description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced minced meat and vegetables.

name: Kebab
description: Succulent grilled meat skewers marinated in traditional Swahili spices.

name: Mahamri
description: Sweet cardamom-infused doughnuts, a coastal Kenyan favorite.

name: Viazi Karai
description: Deep-fried potato cubes coated in a spiced batter, served with chili sauce.

name: Biscuits
description: Homemade butter biscuits with a light, crumbly texture.
